alignedWords.translation: For the pleasure of Shri Rama Chandra
Seated in a firm lotus posture
Eyes competing with fresh lotus petals
Wearing large matted hair as an ornament
Holding a sword, quiver, bow, and arrows
The one who broke Shiva’s bow
Those who roam in the underworld, earth, and sky
By the mantra of world conquest
This is called the diamond armor
The best of the Raghu dynasty
The delight of the Raghu dynasty
Of the seeds of worldly existence
